[[Version 0.9.9]]
* Wine and Song was available during Closed Beta Test 3.
** The base attack stat and base substat (energy recharge) at level 1 were '''42''' and '''10.0%''', respectively.
** The weapon's effect was the following:
***<u>Refinement 1:</u> For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains '''8%''' ATK increase and '''3%''' Movement SPD increase.
***<u>Refinement 2:</u> For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains '''10%''' ATK increase and '''3.5%''' Movement SPD increase.
***<u>Refinement 3:</u> For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains '''12%''' ATK increase and '''4%''' Movement SPD increase.
***<u>Refinement 4:</u> For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains '''14%''' ATK increase and '''4.5%''' Movement SPD increase.
***<u>Refinement 5:</u> For every character in the party who hails from Mondstadt, the character who equips this weapon gains '''16%''' ATK increase and '''5%''' Movement SPD increase.
